title: 4 Reasons Why Alphabet Is My Top Stock to Buy Now
text: Founded in 1993, The Motley Fool is a financial services company dedicated to making the world smarter, happier, and richer. Learn More Fool.com contributor Parkev Tatevosian highlights four reasons why Google parent company Alphabet (GOOG 0.21%) (GOOGL 0.04%) is his top-rated stock to buy now. *Stock prices used were the afternoon prices of March 13, 2024. The video was published on March 15, 2024. Suzanne Frey, an executive at Alphabet, is a member of The Motley Fool's board of directors. Parkev Tatevosian, CFA has positions in Alphabet. The Motley Fool has positions in and recommends Alphabet. The Motley Fool has a disclosure policy.
